text: Periklis Christoforides (1907 - 30 September 1983) was an Ottoman-born Greek film actor. He appeared in 122 films between 1929 and 1979. He was born in Trebizond, Ottoman Empire, and died in Thessaloniki, Greece, following a stroke. His body was flown to Athens on the day of his death and buried the next day. ==Selected filmography== * Madame X (1956) ..... Giannakis Spiggos * The Fortune Teller (1956) .....
